notes: This should remove anything with pattern in_yyyy

title: month_name
notes: This should remove anything with pattern month_name

title: emails
notes: This should remove anything that looks like an email

title: mrn 1
notes: This should remove anything that matches DDDDNDDDDD

title: mixed 1
notes: This should remove anything that matches NNDDD(anything)DDDD

title: mixed 2
notes: This should remove anything that matches NND

title: mixed 3
notes: This should remove anything that matches DDDDNNN

title: ssn_phone_fax
notes: XXX-XX-XXXX, XXX-XXX-XXXX, XXX-XXXXXXXX, etc.

title: blake phone regex
notes: This should remove anything that matches a phone number

title: second phone regex
notes: This should remove anything that xxx.xxx.xxxx

title: 5 digit pager
notes: This should remove anything that matches a pager number

title: Mr., Ms., etc.
notes: This should remove anything that matches Mr. [name], Ms. [name], etc.

title: M.D., N.P., etc.
notes: This should remove anything that matches [name] M.D., etc.

title: Names Blacklist
notes: if word is NNP and in blacklist remove

title: POS MATCHER
notes: This will mark safe any CDs that arent included in earlier steps

title: No catchall
notes: False will turn off catchall, True will turn on catchll (default)
